nodes.text: The Lok Revenants were a group of pirates that existed during the final decades of the Galactic Republic, led by the Feeorin Nym. The pirates operated along the Corellian Run and the end of the Llanic Spice Run, as well as the Arkanis sector in the Outer Rim Territories.

The pirates were often known to target members of the Trade Federation, but gained a reputation for harassing spicerunners, slavers, and even other individuals from time to time. They also operated custom-built starships equipped with exotic weaponry and often worked alongside Jedi Master Adi Gallia.

The Lok Revenants were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Collapse of the Republic, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. They originally appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the flight simulation video game Star Wars: Starfighter developed by LucasArts and released in 2001.
